title: Piers Morgan confronts sexist MEP Janusz Korwin-Mikke on live TV: "You are a horrendous pig"
text:

Piers Morgan made a rare move towards backing feminism today when he attacked an MEP live on air over his sexist views. 
Polish politician Janusz Korwin-Mikke joined Good Morning Britain in the wake of comments he made in the European parliament earlier this week. 
He'd been caught on camera telling shocked MEPs: "Women must earn less than men because they are weaker, smaller and less intelligent. They must earn less, that's all." 
And Piers was only too keen to take Korwin-Mikke to task on International Women's Day . Read More Fury as politician says women should earn less than men because they are 'weaker and less intelligent' Piers and Susanna were both shocked by the MEP's comments (Photo: ITV) 
After demanding to know why the politician had made those comments, Piers got steadily more angry at Korwin-Mikke's views. 
"I only said that because they are shorter, they are weaker and less intelligent they are less aggressive, they earn less," said the Polish lawmaker. 
"By the way, a shorter man earns less than a tall man. The blonde earns more than a brunette. They are different, and it should not be equalised." 
He then turned to 'science' in a bid to back up his claims, explaining that "it is proved" women are "less intelligent by several points on the IQ scale". Janusz Korwin-Mikke has sparked headlines this week (Photo: ITV) 
At one point during the fraught exchange, Piers told him that he was a "horrendous sexiest pig" – prompting Korwin-Mikke to brand Piers an "idiot" for not believing in science. 
When Susanna attempted to speak over the politician, Piers backed her up, telling him to shut up and listen. 
Susanna then branded his scientific claims "utter nonsense" and told him he couldn’t possibly condone a gender pay gap on the basis of height. 
But the MEP fought back, complaining that Piers and Susanna still believed in stereotypes. Piers branded Korwin-Mikke a "sexist pig" (Photo: ITV) 
"We believe in stereotypes!" Piers exploded. "Is that a joke? My god man, you've got some front.You've been married three times, have eight children by four different women … You're an incredibly stupid man." 
After the GMB hosts wrapped up the outrageous segment, Susanna said: "That's one of the most interesting interviews I've ever witnessed. And I do feel like I sat on the sidelines while two men discussed women's intelligence." 
Viewers took to Twitter to exclaim over the eye-opening interview, with many praising Piers for his no-nonsense stance. The MEP refused to back down or apologise (Photo: ITV) 
"That was the most awkward interview ever, @piersmorgan I'm literally crying laughing whilst watching through my fingers!" said one. 
"Piers confronting Janusz Korwin-Mikke about his obnoxious opinions should put to bed any accusation of Piers being sexist," said another. 
Susanna, meanwhile, tweeted: "Women the world over are grateful for his explanation." Like us on Facebook
